content: [{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Enterprise","col":12}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Strategy and big Ideas precede goals. A goal is a way to measure what you want to achieve as an organization. Strategy is about choices, trade-offs, and defining what kind of unique value you are going to deliver to specific customers in our competitive landscape. Strategy is creating a powerful position within a marketplace.","col":12}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Project Charts","col":3}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Strategic Intent","col":3}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Goal Or Objective","col":3}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Topline Budget","col":3}},{"type":"spacer","data":{"col":12}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Portfolio","col":12}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Themes are labels that track high-level organizational goals. Initiatives have a structural design. They house epics, and the completion of those epics will lead to the completion of the initiative. Themes are an organizational tool that allows you to label initiatives to understand what work contributes to what organizational goals. Themes should inspire the creation of initiatives and epics. A theme for a rocket ship company would be something like \"Safety First\". Portfolio groups Themes or Projects.","col":12}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Portfolio Groups","col":3}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Theme Or Headline Program","col":3}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Initiative Or Project","col":3}},{"type":"spacer","data":{"col":12}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Solutions / Programs","col":12}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"An Initiative/Project has many Features/Program-Increments/Phases. These are deliverable components and align to a Jira Master Epic. A Capability is delivered when a certain set of Epics are complete.Goals maybe dependent on a Capability. Capability is an optional planning layer.","col":12}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Capability","col":3}},{"type":"shortcut","data":{"shortcut_name":"Feature or PI or Phase","col":3}},{"type":"spacer","data":{"col":12}}]
label: Clearsight Aims
